tasks.label: One-Click: Sync Portfolio + Commit + Push
args: $ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"; $dirty = git status --porcelain; if ($dirty) { git add -A; git commit -m "WIP autosave before portfolio sync" }; git pull --rebase; node scripts/sync-portfolio.mjs; git add -A; $staged = git diff --cached --name-only; if ($staged) { git commit -m "Sync portfolio photos" }; git push
